name: Never Served 🍔
description:
This is a devlog we made about this game:

Description:

The idea is all about someone who works in a restaurant where he has to fix what stupid stuff his colleague has done!!! By redoing and re-fixing burgers!

Story:
>> Hey I’m Sami 👨‍🍳
>> I make burgers 🍔
>> I love my job 🤩
>> Also so does Su!! 👩‍🍳
>> But she is ruining everything!! 🤦‍♂️
>> She mixed all orders 😵
>> the manager won’t be happy! 😱 
>> now I have to Remake old burgers again! 😟
>> Please help 🥺

Team: 

Sakura Games 

Go subscribe to the below channel, we are going to upload a devlog for this game:

Sham AlBdour & Jana AlBdour
